Function Documentation

int PointingCmd ( ClientData  clientdata,
Tcl_Interp *  interp,
int  objc,
Tcl_Obj *CONST  objv[] 
)

The pointing cpmmand controls the pointing of a mount virtual telescope and takes the following forms:

  • pointing <controller> set <level> <roll> <pitch>
  • pointing <controller> adjust <level> <roll> <pitch>
  • pointing <controller> absorb <level>
  • pointing <controller> tune <axis> <values>
